54 //template<typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
55 template< class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/23
56 void CTangentialRicciFlowExtremalLength<V,E,F,H>::_calculate_topo_valence()
57 {
58  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::MeshVertexIterator viter( this->m_pMesh ); !viter.end(); viter ++ )
59  {
60  V * v = *viter;
61  v->valence() = 0;
62  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::VertexEdgeIterator veiter( v ); !veiter.end(); ++ veiter )
63  {
64  E * e = *veiter;
65  if( e->sharp() ) v->valence() ++;
66  }
67  }
68 }
69 
70 
71 //set target curvature
72 
73 //template<typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
74 template< class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/23
75 void CTangentialRicciFlowExtremalLength<V,E,F,H>::_set_target_curvature()
76 {
77  int count = 0;
78  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::MeshVertexIterator viter( this->m_pMesh ); !viter.end(); viter ++ )
79  {
80  V * v = *viter;
81  v->target_k() = 0;
82 
83  if( v->valence() > 2 )
84  {
85  count ++;
86  v->target_k() = PI/2.0;
87  }
88  }
89  printf("There are %d corners.\n", count );
90 };
91 
92 
93 }
